name: Soulframe
description:
A totally new game in early development, #Soulframe will deliver its own independent and uniquely immersive experience led by the creative and imaginative minds behind Warframe. This free-to-play open world adventure is heavily influenced by themes of nature, restoration, and exploration. This 5-minute, in-engine cinematic Soulframe trailer is your first look at this vibrant new world.

For early fans of Digital Extremes, the path to release will be a familiar one: it will be a transparent, collaborative and iterative process that is shaped by the passion of players and DE. Anyone who wants to join us on our development journey and see more about the game can visit the official website now: https://www.soulframe.com
